pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Regional Consistency Probabilities for Multi-Regional Clinical Trials // Provides methods to calculate approximate regional consistency probabilities using Method 1 and Method 2 proposed by the Japanese Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare (2007) https://www.pmda.go.jp/files/000153265.pdf. These methods are useful for assessing regional consistency in multi- regional clinical trials. The package can calculate unconditional, joint, and conditional regional consistency probabilities. For technical details, please see Homma (2024) doi:10.1002/pst.2358.
